*%*.
Dear Harry:
I talked -with Burton yesterday about
the tape depository at Kent State. He thinks
that you ought to investigate this for all NAEB
programs rather than let me investigate it just
for the Center tapes. So, I am sending you a
catalog which I got from Anna Hyer of the NEA.
I feel sure you have this hut, if not, it conÂ¬
tains some useful information.
The Center is not saying okay to
using Kent State, of course, hut we would like
to have your recommendation.
Program Associate
KDW: ean
